<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Change PKM Item Details</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/backend/api/pkm/{pkm_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Retrieve detailed information about a specific PKM item identified by ID. You may have entered the wrong ssh-key.
